entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 40 percent chance of light snow later this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 30.
